name: Screechers of the Moldy Tram
description: Hailing from the Rootmason capital city of Thespin, the Screechers of the Moldy Tram capture moonlight in a moonlight condenser - old technology created by the Gibbun in order to distill moonlight for further processing. Now a member of a group researching the intersection of Groodu and Rootmason magics, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
